title: I accidentally transferred from my GCash to the wrong bank account. What do I do?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [Someone transferred to my bank using their GCash, but I didn’t receive it](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35184706112409-Someone-transferred-to-my-bank-using-their-GCash-but-I-didn-t-receive-it)
- [I transferred money from my GCash account to a bank or another e-wallet, but it was not received. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31987307617945-I-transferred-money-from-my-GCash-account-to-a-bank-or-another-e-wallet-but-it-was-not-received-What-do-I-do)
- [I accidentally transferred from my GCash to the wrong bank account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30245311794969-I-accidentally-transferred-from-my-GCash-to-the-wrong-bank-account-What-do-I-do)
- [I can't transfer money to another bank using GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30245383627161-I-can-t-transfer-money-to-another-bank-using-GCash-What-do-I-do)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Unfortunately, GCash **cannot reverse or cancel** the “erroneous” Bank Transfer (GCash to Bank) transactions made by the sender, as stated in our [Terms & Conditions.](https://new.gcash.com/terms-and-conditions) **Steps you can take to try to retrieve your funds:**

1. **Contact the receiving bank**: Give the bank details like the transaction date, amount, your account info, and the intended account number.
2. **Provide documentation:** Share any transaction records, like receipts or confirmation messages from GCash, to support your request.

**Tips sending money:**

1. Double-check the recipient’s mobile number/account number and name before you confirm the transaction.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/40305636688409)

    2\. Use our **Scan/Upload Bank QR** feature to scan your recipient’s unique QR code.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/40305636691737)

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [My GSave withdrawal or deposit has not been reflected.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30244088945817)
- [I sent money to the wrong GCash account or number via Express Send. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30244972048409)
- [I think I was scammed. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413295284377)
- [Someone transferred to my bank using their GCash, but I didn’t receive it.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/35184706112409)
- [I can't transfer money to another bank using GCash. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30245383627161)
- [I transferred money from my GCash account to a bank or other e-wallet, but it was not received. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31987307617945)
